properties.name: num_vnuma_nodes
properties.description: : - (Optional) Number of vNUMA nodes. 0 means vNUMA is disabled.

properties.name: nic_list
properties.description: : - (Optional) Spec NICs attached to the VM.

properties.name: serial_port_list
properties.description: : - (Optional) Serial Ports configured on the VM.

properties.name: guest_os_id
properties.description: : - (Optional) Guest OS Identifier. For ESX, refer to VMware documentation link for the list of guest OS identifiers.

properties.name: power_state
properties.description: : - (Optional) The current or desired power state of the VM. (Options : ON , OFF)

properties.name: parent_referece
properties.description: : - (Optional) Reference to an entity that the VM cloned from.

properties.name: boot_device_order_list
properties.description: : - (Optional) Indicates the order of device types in which VM should try to boot from. If boot device order is not provided the system will decide appropriate boot device order.

properties.name: boot_device_disk_address
properties.description: : - (Optional) Address of disk to boot from.

properties.name: boot_device_mac_address
properties.description: : - (Optional) MAC address of nic to boot from.

properties.name: hardware_clock_timezone
properties.description: : - (Optional) VM's hardware clock timezone in IANA TZDB format (America/Los_Angeles).

properties.name: guest_customization_cloud_init_user_data
properties.description: : - (Optional) The contents of the user_data configuration for cloud-init. This can be formatted as YAML, JSON, or could be a shell script. The value must be base64 encoded.

properties.name: guest_customization_cloud_init_meta_data
properties.description: (Optional) The contents of the meta_data configuration for cloud-init. This can be formatted as YAML or JSON. The value must be base64 encoded.

properties.name: guest_customization_cloud_init_custom_key_values
properties.description: : - (Optional) Generic key value pair used for custom attributes in cloud init.

properties.name: guest_customization_is_overridable
properties.description: : - (Optional) Flag to allow override of customization by deployer.

properties.name: guest_customization_sysprep
properties.description: : - (Optional) VM guests may be customized at boot time using one of several different methods. Currently, cloud-init w/ ConfigDriveV2 (for Linux VMs) and Sysprep (for Windows VMs) are supported. Only ONE OF sysprep or cloud_init should be provided. Note that guest customization can currently only be set during VM creation. Attempting to change it after creation will result in an error. Additional properties can be specified. For example - in the context of VM template creation if \"override_script\" is set to \"True\" then the deployer can upload their own custom script.

properties.name: guest_customization_sysrep_custom_key_values
properties.description: : - (Optional) Generic key value pair used for custom attributes in sysrep.

properties.name: should_fail_on_script_failure
properties.description: : - (Optional) Extra configs related to power state transition. Indicates whether to abort ngt shutdown/reboot if script fails.

properties.name: enable_script_exec
properties.description: : - (Optional) Extra configs related to power state transition. Indicates whether to execute set script before ngt shutdown/reboot.

properties.name: power_state_mechanism
properties.description: : - (Optional) Indicates the mechanism guiding the VM power state transition. Currently used for the transition to \"OFF\" state. Power state mechanism (ACPI/GUEST/HARD).

properties.name: vga_console_enabled
properties.description: : - (Optional) Indicates whether VGA console should be enabled or not.

properties.name: disk-list
properties.description: » Disk List

properties.name: uuid
properties.description: : - (Optional) The device ID which is used to uniquely identify this particular disk.

properties.name: disk_size_bytes
properties.description: (Optional) Size of the disk in Bytes.

properties.name: disk_size_mib
properties.description: Size of the disk in MiB. Must match the size specified in 'disk_size_bytes'

The disk_size (the disk size_mib and the disk_size_bytes attributes) is only honored by creating an empty disk. When you are creating from an image, the size is ignored and the disk becomes the size of the image from which it was cloned. In VM creation, you can't set either disk size_mib or disk_size_bytes when you set data_source_reference but, you can update the disk_size after creation (second apply).

properties.name: device-properties
properties.description: » Device Properties

properties.name: disk_address
properties.description: : - Address of disk to boot from.

properties.name: install_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) Whether the guest will be freshly installed using this unattend configuration, or whether this unattend configuration will be applied to a pre-prepared image. Default is \"PREPARED\".

properties.name: unattend_xml
properties.description: : - (Optional) Generic key value pair used for custom attributes.

properties.name: disk-address
properties.description: » Disk Address

properties.name: device_index
properties.description: : - (Optional) The index of the disk address.

properties.name: adapter_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) The adapter type of the disk address.

properties.name: gpu-list
properties.description: » GPU List

properties.name: frame_buffer_size_mib
properties.description: : - (ReadOnly) GPU frame buffer size in MiB.

properties.name: fraction
properties.description: (ReadOnly) Fraction of the physical GPU assigned.

properties.name: num_virtual_display_heads
properties.description: : - (ReadOnly) Number of supported virtual display heads.

properties.name: device_id
properties.description: : - (Computed) The device ID of the GPU.

properties.name: nutanix-guest-tools
properties.description: » Nutanix Guest Tools

properties.name: state
properties.description: : - (Optional) Nutanix Guest Tools is enabled or not.

properties.name: ngt_state
properties.description: : - (Optional) Nutanix Guest Tools is enabled or not.

properties.name: iso_mount_state
properties.description: : - (Optional) Desired mount state of Nutanix Guest Tools ISO.

properties.name: version
properties.description: : - (ReadOnly) Version of Nutanix Guest Tools installed on the VM.

properties.name: available_version
properties.description: : - (ReadOnly) Version of Nutanix Guest Tools available on the cluster.

properties.name: guest_os_version
properties.description: : - (ReadOnly) Version of the operating system on the VM.

properties.name: vss_snapshot_capable
properties.description: : - (ReadOnly) Whether the VM is configured to take VSS snapshots through NGT.

properties.name: is_reachable
properties.description: : - (ReadOnly) Communication from VM to CVM is active or not.

properties.name: vm_mobility_drivers_installed
properties.description: : - (ReadOnly) Whether VM mobility drivers are installed in the VM.

properties.name: nic-list
properties.description: » NIC List

properties.name: nic_type
properties.description: : - The type of this NIC. Defaults to NORMAL_NIC. (Options : NORMAL_NIC , DIRECT_NIC , NETWORK_FUNCTION_NIC).

properties.name: uuid
properties.description: : - The NIC's UUID, which is used to uniquely identify this particular NIC. This UUID may be used to refer to the NIC outside the context of the particular VM it is attached to.

properties.name: model
properties.description: : - The model of this NIC. (Options : VIRTIO , E1000).

properties.name: network_function_nic_type
properties.description: : - The type of this Network function NIC. Defaults to INGRESS. (Options : INGRESS , EGRESS , TAP).

properties.name: mac_address
properties.description: : - The MAC address for the adapter.

properties.name: ip_endpoint_list
properties.description: : - IP endpoints for the adapter. Currently, IPv4 addresses are supported.

properties.name: subnet_name
properties.description: : - The name of the subnet reference to.

properties.name: floating_ip
properties.description: : - The Floating IP associated with the vnic. (Only in nic_list_status)

properties.name: serial-port-list
properties.description: » Serial Port List

properties.name: is_connected
properties.description: : - Indicates whether the serial port connection is connected or not (true or false).

properties.name: type
properties.description: : - Address type. It can only be "ASSIGNED" in the spec. If no type is specified in the spec, the default type is set to "ASSIGNED". (Options : ASSIGNED , LEARNED)

properties.name: flash_mode
properties.description: : - (Optional) Flash Mode, if enabled all volume disks of the VG will be pinned to SSD tier.

properties.name: file_system_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) File system to be used for volume.

properties.name: sharing_status
properties.description: : - (Optiional) Whether the volume group can be shared across multiple iSCSI initiators.

properties.name: disk-list
properties.description: » Disk List

properties.name: vmdisk_UUID
properties.description: : - (Optional) The UUID of this volume disk.

properties.name: index
properties.description: : - (Optional) Index of the volume disk in the group.

properties.name: disk_size_mib
properties.description: : - (Optional) Size of the disk in MiB.

properties.name: storage_container_UUID
properties.description: : - (Optional) Container UUID on which to create the disk.

properties.name: attachment-list
properties.description: » Attachment List

properties.name: iscsi_initiator_name
properties.description: : - (Optional) Name of the iSCSI initiator of the workload outside Nutanix cluster.

properties.name: architecture
properties.description: : - (Optional) The supported CPU architecture for a disk image.

properties.name: checksum
properties.description: : - (Optional) Checksum of the image. The checksum is used for image validation if the image has a source specified. For images that do not have their source specified the checksum is generated by the image service.

properties.name: source_uri
properties.description: : - (Optional) The source URI points at the location of the source image which is used to create/update image.

properties.name: source_path
properties.description: : - (Optional) A local path to upload an image.

properties.name: product_name
properties.description: : - (Optional) Name of the producer/distribution of the image. For example windows or red hat.

properties.name: product_version
properties.description: : - (Optional) Version string for the disk image.

properties.name: name
properties.description: : - (Required) The name for the category key.

properties.name: name
properties.description: : - (Required) The category_key name for the category value.

properties.name: value
properties.description: (Required) The value for the category value.

properties.name: quarantine_rule_action
properties.description: : - (Optional) These rules are used for quarantining suspected VMs. Target group is a required attribute. Empty inbound_allow_list will not allow anything into target group. Empty outbound_allow_list will allow everything from target group.

properties.name: quarantine_rule_target_group_default_internal_policy
properties.description: : - (Optional) - Default policy for communication within target group.

properties.name: quarantine_rule_target_group_peer_specification_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) - Way to identify the object for which rule is applied.

properties.name: quarantine_rule_target_group_filter_kind_list
properties.description: : - (Optional) - List of kinds associated with this filter.

properties.name: quarantine_rule_target_group_filter_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) - The type of the filter being used.

properties.name: quarantine_rule_target_group_filter_params
properties.description: : - (Optional) - A list of category key and list of values.

properties.name: app_rule_action
properties.description: : - (Optional) - These rules govern what flows are allowed. Target group is a required attribute. Empty inbound_allow_list will not anything into target group. Empty outbound_allow_list will allow everything from target group.

properties.name: app_rule_target_group_default_internal_policy
properties.description: : - (Optional) - Default policy for communication within target group.

properties.name: app_rule_target_group_peer_specification_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) - Way to identify the object for which rule is applied.

properties.name: app_rule_target_group_filter_kind_list
properties.description: : - (Optional) - List of kinds associated with this filter.

properties.name: app_rule_target_group_filter_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) - The type of the filter being used.

properties.name: app_rule_target_group_filter_params
properties.description: : - (Optional) - A list of category key and list of values.

properties.name: isolation_rule_action
properties.description: : - (Optional) - These rules are used for environmental isolation.

properties.name: isolation_rule_first_entity_filter_kind_list
properties.description: : - (Optional) - List of kinds associated with this filter.

properties.name: isolation_rule_first_entity_filter_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) - The type of the filter being used.

properties.name: isolation_rule_first_entity_filter_params
properties.description: : - (Optional) - A list of category key and list of values.

properties.name: isolation_rule_second_entity_filter_kind_list
properties.description: : - (Optional) - List of kinds associated with this filter.

properties.name: isolation_rule_second_entity_filter_type
properties.description: : - (Optional) - The type of the filter being used.

properties.name: isolation_rule_second_entity_filter_params
properties.description: : - (Optional) - A list of category key and list of values.
